query: SELECT * FROM INT2_TBL AS f(a, b)
expected: SELECT * FROM int2_tbl AS f(a, b)

query: SELECT * FROM (TABLE int2_tbl) AS s (a, b)
expected: SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM int2_tbl) AS s(a, b)

query: SELECT i.* FROM INT2_TBL i WHERE i.f1 <> int2 '0'
expected: SELECT i.* FROM int2_tbl AS i WHERE i.f1 <> CAST('0' AS SMALLINT)

query: SELECT i.* FROM INT2_TBL i WHERE i.f1 <> int4 '0'
expected: SELECT i.* FROM int2_tbl AS i WHERE i.f1 <> CAST('0' AS INT)

query: SELECT i.* FROM INT2_TBL i WHERE i.f1 = int2 '0'
expected: SELECT i.* FROM int2_tbl AS i WHERE i.f1 = CAST('0' AS SMALLINT)

query: SELECT i.* FROM INT2_TBL i WHERE i.f1 = int4 '0'
expected: SELECT i.* FROM int2_tbl AS i WHERE i.f1 = CAST('0' AS INT)

query: SELECT i.* FROM INT2_TBL i WHERE i.f1 < int2 '0'
expected: SELECT i.* FROM int2_tbl AS i WHERE i.f1 < CAST('0' AS SMALLINT)

query: SELECT i.* FROM INT2_TBL i WHERE i.f1 < int4 '0'
expected: SELECT i.* FROM int2_tbl AS i WHERE i.f1 < CAST('0' AS INT)

query: SELECT i.* FROM INT2_TBL i WHERE i.f1 <= int2 '0'
expected: SELECT i.* FROM int2_tbl AS i WHERE i.f1 <= CAST('0' AS SMALLINT)

query: SELECT i.* FROM INT2_TBL i WHERE i.f1 <= int4 '0'
expected: SELECT i.* FROM int2_tbl AS i WHERE i.f1 <= CAST('0' AS INT)

query: SELECT i.* FROM INT2_TBL i WHERE i.f1 > int2 '0'
expected: SELECT i.* FROM int2_tbl AS i WHERE i.f1 > CAST('0' AS SMALLINT)

query: SELECT i.* FROM INT2_TBL i WHERE i.f1 > int4 '0'
expected: SELECT i.* FROM int2_tbl AS i WHERE i.f1 > CAST('0' AS INT)

query: SELECT i.* FROM INT2_TBL i WHERE i.f1 >= int2 '0'
expected: SELECT i.* FROM int2_tbl AS i WHERE i.f1 >= CAST('0' AS SMALLINT)

query: SELECT i.* FROM INT2_TBL i WHERE i.f1 >= int4 '0'
expected: SELECT i.* FROM int2_tbl AS i WHERE i.f1 >= CAST('0' AS INT)

query: SELECT i.* FROM INT2_TBL i WHERE (i.f1 % int2 '2') = int2 '1'
expected: SELECT i.* FROM int2_tbl AS i WHERE (i.f1 % CAST('2' AS SMALLINT)) = CAST('1' AS SMALLINT)

query: SELECT i.* FROM INT2_TBL i WHERE (i.f1 % int4 '2') = int2 '0'
expected: SELECT i.* FROM int2_tbl AS i WHERE (i.f1 % CAST('2' AS INT)) = CAST('0' AS SMALLINT)

query: SELECT i.f1, i.f1 * int2 '2' AS x FROM INT2_TBL i
expected: SELECT i.f1, i.f1 * CAST('2' AS SMALLINT) AS x FROM int2_tbl AS i

query: SELECT i.f1, i.f1 * int2 '2' AS x FROM INT2_TBL i WHERE abs(f1) < 16384
expected: SELECT i.f1, i.f1 * CAST('2' AS SMALLINT) AS x FROM int2_tbl AS i WHERE abs(f1) < 16384

query: SELECT i.f1, i.f1 * int4 '2' AS x FROM INT2_TBL i
expected: SELECT i.f1, i.f1 * CAST('2' AS INT) AS x FROM int2_tbl AS i

query: SELECT i.f1, i.f1 + int2 '2' AS x FROM INT2_TBL i
expected: SELECT i.f1, i.f1 + CAST('2' AS SMALLINT) AS x FROM int2_tbl AS i

query: SELECT i.f1, i.f1 + int2 '2' AS x FROM INT2_TBL i WHERE f1 < 32766
expected: SELECT i.f1, i.f1 + CAST('2' AS SMALLINT) AS x FROM int2_tbl AS i WHERE f1 < 32766

query: SELECT i.f1, i.f1 + int4 '2' AS x FROM INT2_TBL i
expected: SELECT i.f1, i.f1 + CAST('2' AS INT) AS x FROM int2_tbl AS i

query: SELECT i.f1, i.f1 - int2 '2' AS x FROM INT2_TBL i
expected: SELECT i.f1, i.f1 - CAST('2' AS SMALLINT) AS x FROM int2_tbl AS i

query: SELECT i.f1, i.f1 - int2 '2' AS x FROM INT2_TBL i WHERE f1 > -32767
expected: SELECT i.f1, i.f1 - CAST('2' AS SMALLINT) AS x FROM int2_tbl AS i WHERE f1 > -32767

query: SELECT i.f1, i.f1 - int4 '2' AS x FROM INT2_TBL i
expected: SELECT i.f1, i.f1 - CAST('2' AS INT) AS x FROM int2_tbl AS i

query: SELECT i.f1, i.f1 / int2 '2' AS x FROM INT2_TBL i
expected: SELECT i.f1, i.f1 / CAST('2' AS SMALLINT) AS x FROM int2_tbl AS i

query: SELECT i.f1, i.f1 / int4 '2' AS x FROM INT2_TBL i
expected: SELECT i.f1, i.f1 / CAST('2' AS INT) AS x FROM int2_tbl AS i
SELECT CAST((-CAST(1 AS SMALLINT) << 15) AS TEXT)
SELECT CAST((CAST((-CAST(1 AS SMALLINT) << 15) + 1 AS SMALLINT)) AS TEXT)
SELECT CAST(CAST((-32768) AS SMALLINT) * (-1) AS SMALLINT)
SELECT CAST(CAST((-32768) AS SMALLINT) / (-1) AS SMALLINT)
SELECT CAST(CAST((-32768) AS SMALLINT) % (-1) AS SMALLINT)

query: SELECT x, x::int2 AS int2_value FROM (VALUES (-2.5::float8), (-1.5::float8), (-0.5::float8), (0.0::float8), (0.5::float8), (1.5::float8), (2.5::float8)) t(x)
expected: SELECT x, CAST(x AS SMALLINT) AS int2_value FROM (VALUES (-CAST(2.5 AS FLOAT8)), (-CAST(1.5 AS FLOAT8)), (-CAST(0.5 AS FLOAT8)), (CAST(0.0 AS FLOAT8)), (CAST(0.5 AS FLOAT8)), (CAST(1.5 AS FLOAT8)), (CAST(2.5 AS FLOAT8))) AS t(x)

query: SELECT x, x::int2 AS int2_value FROM (VALUES (-2.5::numeric), (-1.5::numeric), (-0.5::numeric), (0.0::numeric), (0.5::numeric), (1.5::numeric), (2.5::numeric)) t(x)
expected: SELECT x, CAST(x AS SMALLINT) AS int2_value FROM (VALUES (-CAST(2.5 AS NUMERIC)), (-CAST(1.5 AS NUMERIC)), (-CAST(0.5 AS NUMERIC)), (CAST(0.0 AS NUMERIC)), (CAST(0.5 AS NUMERIC)), (CAST(1.5 AS NUMERIC)), (CAST(2.5 AS NUMERIC))) AS t(x)
